channel.title: The Blog of Altanzhul
channel.description: Recent content on The Blog of Altanzhul

item.title: Learncode 1
item.description: Learned how to Post my Rmd blog in R tools -> Addins -> New Post -> Execute You can create a new Rmd document for the Post New Post Enter title, author and other information. Categories choose R, Format choose R Markdown, Click the Done button to see the generated Rmd document in the Post folder,and then you can edit it.

item.title: 主拉
item.description: 你好， 这是我的第一篇博文
